dimension: 30 x 9 in. (76.2 x 22.86 cm) (length including fringe)
title: Head Scarf
description: green 1/2\"-1\" woven and embroidered bands with narrow red lines; many different patterns; separated by tan stripes; 3\"-4\" warp fringe at both ends; fringe is knotted at very end
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
